title: The Man from East Liverpool: Ben Feldman
creator_contributor_role: Jay J Sheridan and Company, production company

description: Instructional film on salesmanship and setting goals for yourself. Uses Insurance salesman Ben Feldman as the focus. He gives a background of himself and how he got to where he is today. He is shown in action conducting sales in real scenarios demonstrating the attitudes needed to achieve personal success.
